SEARCH
Package Model

Class Database

java.lang.Object
Model.Database
public class Database extends Object
The Database class provides methods to interact with database hosted by AWS for saving and retrieving game data

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Database()
    Constructs a new Database object and establishes a connection to the database

  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      public Database() throws SQLException
      Constructs a new Database object and establishes a connection to the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

  • Method Details

    • saveGame

      public boolean saveGame(LinkedList<Move> moves, int game_id, Rectangle[] final_positions, String game_name, boolean resumed) throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Parameters:
      moves - The list of moves made in the game
      game_id - The initial configuration of the game (0-3)
      final_positions - The final configuration of the game, array[10]
      game_name - The name of the game
      resumed - if the game has been already saved
      Returns:
      true if the game is successfully saved, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      IllegalAccessException - if the user is not logged in

    • getSavedMoves

      public LinkedList<Move> getSavedMoves(String game_name) throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Retrieves the saved moves of a game from the database, empty if the game isn't found
      Parameters:
      game_name - The name of the game in which the saved moves is needed
      Returns:
      a LinkedList of Move objects representing the saved moves
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      IllegalAccessException - if the user is not logged in

    • getIdConfiguration

      public int getIdConfiguration(String game_name) throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Retrieves the ID of the game configuration with the given name
      Returns:
      the ID of the game configuration (0-3)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the game isn't found
      IllegalAccessException - if the user is not logged in

    • getInitialPositions

      public Rectangle[] getInitialPositions(int game_id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the initial positions of a game from the database
      Parameters:
      game_id - The ID of the game configuration.
      Returns:
      an array of Rectangle[10] objects representing the initial positions, empty if there is not that configuration id
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getFinalPositions

      public Rectangle[] getFinalPositions(String game_name) throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Retrieves the final positions of a game from the database
      Parameters:
      game_name - name of the game
      Returns:
      an array of Rectangle[10] objects representing the final positions, empty array if there is not any game with that name
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      IllegalAccessException - if the user is not logged in

    • getGameList

      public Vector<String> getGameList() throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Returns:
      a Vector of game names associated with the logged-in user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      IllegalAccessException - if the user is not logged in.

    • deleteGame

      public void deleteGame(String game_name) throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Delete the game with the corresponding name, nothing happened if the game_name doesn't exist
      Parameters:
      game_name - The name of the game to be deleted
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      IllegalAccessException - if the user is not logged in

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user (not null)
      password - The password of the user (not null)
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • registration

      public boolean registration(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      Registers a new user with the given username and password
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new user (not null)
      password - The password of the new user (not null)
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • resetIdPlayer

      public void resetIdPlayer()

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection() throws SQLException
      Closes the database connection and resets the ID of the currently logged-in player
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • deleteAllGames

      public void deleteAllGames() throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Deletes all games associated with the logged-in user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      IllegalAccessException - if the user is not logged in.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser() throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Deletes the logged user from the database and logs out
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IllegalAccessException
